{"id":787560483,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1661902703,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"162 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/787560483/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Recover Binary Search Tree","memory":"52.4 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * function TreeNode(val, left, right) {\n *     this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)\n *     this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left)\n *     this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right)\n * }\n */\n/**\n * @param {TreeNode} root\n * @return {void} Do not return anything, modify root in-place instead.\n */\nvar recoverTree = function(root) {\n    let nodes = [], k = 0\n    \n    let dfs = (root) => {\n        if (!root) return\n        dfs(root.left)\n        nodes.push(root.val)\n        dfs(root.right)\n    }\n    \n    let recover = (root) => {\n        if (!root) return null\n        recover(root.left)\n        root.val = nodes[k]\n        k++\n        recover(root.right)\n    }\n    \n    dfs(root)\n    nodes.sort((a, b) => a - b)\n    \n    recover(root)\n    \n    return root\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"recover-binary-search-tree","has_notes":false}
